attributes.action: make it mandatory that if an MP stands down for whatever reason a bye election is automatically and immediately called.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When an MP 'stands down' a bye election should be called immediately. Under the current situation an MP could stand down but still be an MP for a particular constituency for up to four years!! This is particularly irksome when there has been wrongdoing by the MP.
